description:
A set of 22 costumes, 2 different color variations of the default character outfit for each of the 11 party members.

Featured costumes:
- Ryza: "Midsummer Fruit" and "Island Ripples"
- Klaudia: "Mature Attitude" and "Summer Breeze"
- Lent: "White Paladin" and "Blasting Warrior"
- Tao: "Devil Hunter" and "Night Walker"
- Patricia: "Knight's Finery" and "Summer Shade Lady"
- Empel: "Master's Whimsy" and "Mystery Seeker"
- Lila: "Cosmo Gold" and "Exotic Fang"
- Bos: "Senior Uniform" and "Gentleman's Taste"
- Federica: "Classic Lapis Lazuli" and "Blessed Attire"
- Dian: "Forest Rampage" and "Jungle Hunter"
- Kala: "Tune of Ages" and "Dragon Priestess"

Note: Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" from the diary on the desk in the atelier. The respective character must be in your party.
Please visit the official website for more information. 

This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key Ultimate Edition."
name: "Another Look" Costume Set
